alert.note: Alert for Central Plaquemines; Lower Jefferson; Upper Plaquemines (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 16 at 4:20PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern St. Charles, northern Jefferson and northwestern Plaquemines Parishes through 500 PM CDT... At 419 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Woodmere, or near Harvey, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Marrero, Harvey, Timberlane, Belle Chasse, Gretna, Westwego, Jean Lafitte, Woodmere, Lafitte, Estelle, Barataria, Terrytown and Bridge City. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is also occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Central Plaquemines; Lower Jefferson; Upper Plaquemines
